Detección general del cáncer en la mujer Este artículo ofrece información general la detección del cáncer en personas con mamas, cuello uterino o útero. ¿Qué es la Quimioprevención? La quimioprevención es el uso de un medicamento, vitamina o suplemento para detener la aparición del cáncer. Esto se usa con mayor frecuencia para las personas que tienen un alto riesgo de desarrollar cáncer. Vaccines for Cancer Prevention An oncogenic virus (or oncovirus) is a virus causes cancer. These include HIV, HPV (Human Papilloma B and C Epstein and There are vaccines available to prevent infection with HPV and Hepatitis Your Dental Visit Can Prevent or Detect Cancer You may not think of your routine dental visit as a cancer screening test, but, in part, it is. Dentists and dental hygienists examine your mouth, tongue and surrounding tissue much more closely than you do and are most often the people who find pre-cancerous or cancerous lesions in early stages of growth. Cancer Screening Tests: The Basics Cancer screening tests look for cancer before a person has any symptoms. Learn more about what makes a good screening test and their limitations.
